name: Life Beyond (Toxyn Games)
description:
LIFE BEYOND, A HORROR GAME PACKED WITH SURPRISES THAT ARE LURKING IN THE DEPTHS OF THE SHADOWS CINEMATIC TEASER 

Forced to perform an emergency docking manoeuvre at an unresponsive space station, the player must complete various objectives in a 3D First-person Sci-Fi Survivor Horror scenario. The player's goal is to restore power and make it to an emergency shuttle while surviving the remnants of an awful secret left by the NIS Corporation.

CONTROLS
  • Hold W, A, S, and D to walk
  • Hold C to crouch
  • Press G to replenish the glow stick
  • ESC to open the menu and alternatively change settings 
CREDITS

Made by the members of a South African Gaming Industry, known as Toxyn Games.
